import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({email:'',password:''});const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();// Check if any of the input fields are empty
if(!formData.email||!formData.password){Swal.fire({icon:'error',title:'Validation Error',text:'Please fill in all fields.'});return;}// Email validation

console.log('API response:',response.data);// Handle success
